name: NSFileProviderRequest
desc: An object that provides information about the application requesting data from the File Provider extension.

items.name: var domainVersion: NSFileProviderDomainVersion?
items.desc: The version of the domain for the request.

items.name: var requestingExecutable: URL?
items.desc: The URL of the requesting executable.

items.name: var isFileViewerRequest: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the request came from Finder or related system file browsers.

items.name: var isSystemRequest: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the request came from a system process.
